name: Add "Hello," before Roblox Username [RoGold Only]
description:
Adds back the "Hello," message before the Roblox username and "!" after the username on the Roblox homepage
*ONLY WORKS WITH ROGOLD CHROME EXTENSION*
additional_info:
Changelog:
[2/18/23]
-Added disclaimer to description

[7/24/22]
-Fixed style not working

[6/14/22]
-This style now only works with the latest RoGold update, as Roblox removed the feature of having the profile picture and the username on the home page :(
